name: Python (New)
description: Multi-choice test that measures the knowledge of Python programming, databases, modules and library. For junior to mid-level roles.

name: Technology Professional 8.0 Job Focused Assessment
description: The Technology Job Focused Assessment assesses key behavioral attributes required for success in fast-paced roles.

name: Java Programming Assessment
description: Evaluates Java programming skills including OOP concepts, data structures, and algorithms.

name: SQL Assessment
description: Tests SQL query writing, database design, and data manipulation skills.

name: JavaScript Assessment
description: Measures JavaScript programming knowledge including ES6+, async programming, and DOM manipulation.

name: Teamwork and Collaboration Assessment
description: Measures ability to work effectively in teams and collaborate with stakeholders.

name: Leadership Assessment
description: Evaluates leadership competencies and management capabilities.

name: Cognitive Ability Test
description: Measures analytical thinking, problem-solving, and reasoning abilities.

name: Communication Skills Assessment
description: Assesses written and verbal communication effectiveness.

name: Analytical Thinking Assessment
description: Tests data analysis, logical reasoning, and critical thinking skills.
